headline: Why Analysts See Mastercard (MA) Story Shifting As Growth And Valuation Assumptions Rebalance
summary: Why Mastercard's Fair Value Estimate Just Shifted The recent update trims Mastercard's modeled fair value estimate slightly, from about US$665.09 to about US$661.14 per share, even as the revenue growth assumption moves from about 11.16% to about 12.45% and the discount rate edges down from about 7.41% to about 7.29%. This mix of a modestly lower price target, a lower discount rate, and higher modeled growth reflects what many analysts are wrestling with right now: solid revenue trends on one...

headline: Strong Top-Line Growth Drives Analyst Sentiment on Mastercard (MA)
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is included in our list of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. On February 1, 2026, BofA lowered its price target on Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) from $616 to $610, while retaining a ‘Neutral’ rating. Two days earlier, Bryan Bergin of TD Cowen raised the price target to $671 […]
